title: Voter Suppression Or Infighting? Rockefeller Xmas Tree Truther 11.24.20
itunes:title: Voter Suppression Or Infighting? Rockefeller Xmas Tree Truther 11.24.20
description:
In episode 766, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Steve Hernandez to discuss the Trump administration cutting ties with Sidney Powell, a study showing that masks work, the Rockefeller Christmas tree, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. What We Know About Sidney Powell, the Lawyer Behind Wild Voting Conspiracy Theories
  2. Sidney Powell: Trump team cuts ties with lawyer who peddled bizarre fraud claims
  3. Mask Mandates Work To Slow Spread Of Coronavirus, Kansas Study Finds
  4. About That Maligned Christmas Tree (and That Owl) at Rockefeller Center
  5. A Brief History of the Christmas Tree in Rockefeller Center
  6. Owl rescued from Rockefeller Christmas tree is almost ready to be released
  7. WATCH: Jeremih - Fuck You All The Time (Shlohmo Remix)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
